Description:
Monitor and alert on group membership removal of groups that have CA policy modification access

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Thomas Detzner '@tdetzner'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: User Removed From Group With CA Policy Modification Access
Query: sourcetype='azure-auditlogs' eql select * from _source_ where properties.message = 'remove member from group'
